snippet.title: Pingo Adventure - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Pingo Adventure now!
Steam: https://s.team/a/2015830
Itch: https://orb-square.itch.io/pingo-adventure

Pingo Adventure is a cute 3D platformer with interesting physics simulation. Follow Pingo to explore the world, solve puzzles, play mini games and even customize your Pingo with the costumes unlocked from the adventures!

Join discord server(https://discord.gg/KqQFaD6sxR) to follow the development
Or follow on social medias:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/orb_square
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Pingo-Adventure-111317584917573
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pingo_adventure

Press kit: https://orb-square.com/press/pingo-adventure/

#videogames #gaming #indiegames #platformer #steam #itchio
